abstract: Archdiocese of San Salvador suspends Msgr Jesus Delgado, high-ranking vicar general of diocese, while investigating accusations that he had sexually abused girl from age of 9 until age 17.
lead_paragraph: A high-ranking priest was suspended while the church investigated allegations that he had sexually abused a girl over an eight-year period.

headline.main: El Salvador: Priest Faces Abuse Inquiry
headline.print_headline: The Americas; El Salvador: Priest Faces Abuse Inquiry

snippet: A high-ranking priest was suspended while the church investigated allegations that he had sexually abused a girl over an eight-year period.
